drift_rate.definition: Proportion of ticks where the agent decides to drift.

drift_time_fraction.definition: Fraction of simulated time spent in drift (unweighted).

intensity_weighted_drift_fraction.definition: Estimated mental time in drift: drift_rate × mean drift_intensity.

drifts_per_hour.definition: Average number of drift events per simulated hour.

drifts_per_16h_day.definition: Extrapolated drift count over a 16-hour waking day.

drift_type_internal_ratio.definition: Share of drift events classified as internal (thought/rumination).

drift_type_attentional_leak_ratio.definition: Share of drift events classified as attentional leaks (environment, notifications, etc.).

drift_type_behavioral_ratio.definition: Share of drift events classified as behavioral (changing physical task/behavior).

attention_stability_ratio.definition: Proportion of ticks labeled as 'stable' in reflection.attention_stability.

drift_topic_coherence.definition: Average cosine similarity between consecutive drift topics (1 = highly coherent, 0 = orthogonal).

justification_consistency.definition: Average cosine similarity between consecutive drift justifications.

semantic_plan_deviation.definition: Average semantic distance (1 - cosine similarity) between plan.topic and drift_topic on drift ticks.

task_switch_cost.definition: Number of times the agent changes its action between ticks.

plan_adherence.definition: Fraction of ticks where executed action matches planned action.

action_diversity.definition: Number of unique actions taken during the run.

n_ticks.definition: Total number of ticks in the session.
